message:
I am facing a little problem with a simple java application 
My problem simply is ClassNotFoundException. Although I am using Maven for dependency management and the required jars exists in the repo, I still get that exception. 
The full details listed in the following stackoverflow question

http://stackoverflow.com/questions/33594281/java-lang-classnotfoundexception-org-apache-spark-streaming-twitter-twitterrece 

Can anyone direct how to solve this issue ?
